thread.title: Margarita Cranmer

author: Margarita Cranmer
title: Margarita Cranmer
text:
I wasn't sure about this service to start with....a work colleague recommended it to me and set it up on my phone....
After a couple of months I decided to give it a trial run...as I need to transfer euros on a regular basis. I was doing this through my own bank..but they were giving me a dreadful rate of exchage and charged me for the privilege !!! Travelwise fees are more than reasonable and happy to pay them for their quick service....
It's a slick operation.
Thank you
